snippet.title: PC Longplay [622] Redux: Dark Matters
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Tsunao

Shmup by KTX Software.

I...think there's something about an alien....and Dark Matter? Iunno. Shmup = no plot!!

Kinda reminds me of R-Type (option-y thing on the front of the ship). You can use it to absorb bullets, as well as using a field absorbing thing. When the field is active, it will absorb bullets around you as well as place a cursor over potential targets. You can then shoot homing lasers at whatever is locked on. Destroying certain enemies will drop blue chips, which gives a lot of points.

This longplay blows stuff up on Normal difficulty with...I guess a decent score. I DID had thoughts on doing Veteran, but it is difficult (no absorbing shenanigans) and bullet absorbing is main gameplay! I started blowing up on the last stage because lasers are BLEEEEEEEEH! I didn't want to score...at....all. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
